sn10.10:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
sn10.10:4.2: Now at that time a certain lay follower gave food to the nun Sukkā.
sn10.10:4.3: Then a native spirit had so much confidence in Sukkā that he went street to street and square to square, and on that occasion recited these verses:
sn10.10:5.2: That lay follower is so very wise.
sn10.10:5.3: He just gave food to Sukkā,
sn10.10:5.4: who is released from all ties.”
